name: Flash Gordon: Race for Ajax
description:
Open fire. All weapons. Dispatch War Rocket Ajax to bring back his body.

Bring your inner CAMPY ACTION HERO to LIFE in this incredible* LIVE ACTION 2.5D 80s fueled EXTRAVAGANZA!

Punch Ming's Goons!

Board War Rocket Ajax!

Save The Universe!!

Created as a solo project for the UoB CSS x UCL EWB Game Jam 2020.

Theme: Keep Moving Forwards.

*this game was made it about 12 hours. It's probably not that incredible, but it's rather fun.

ps: refresh the page if the cursor is stuck
